titleStmt.title: Trusty and wel-beloved, we greet you well
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Title from first line of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
"Given at our court at Oxford, the 14. day of February, in the nineteenth year of our raigne. 1643."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
